## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.
# K 4 PREMIUM POWER CONTROL FLEX HOME

## Text Content

Der K 4 Power Control Premium Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole ist für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen rund ums Haus sowie Autos geeignet. Inkl. Home Kit.

## Text Content

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529172711
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.8
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12.2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 18.1
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 417 × 306 × 584

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 160 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]

Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image displays a yellow pressure washer with several components and accessories. The main unit is prominently featured, with a handle and hose reel. Accompanying the pressure washer are various attachments:

- A surface cleaner attachment with a circular base.
- Two different spray lances, one of which appears to be a dirt blaster.
- A bottle of cleaning detergent.

### Labels and Certifications

On the right side of the image, there are several icons and labels:

1. **Record Holder**: An icon indicating a record-holding status.
2. **World's No. 1 Pressure Washer Brand**: A label asserting the brand's global leadership.
3. **Made in Europe**: An icon indicating European manufacturing.
4. **Eco!ogic**: A label suggesting environmental friendliness.
5. **+190% Power**: An icon indicating enhanced power performance.

These elements suggest the product's high performance, environmental consideration, and European origin.
